name: webcharts
description: A library for creating flexible, interactive charts

scripts.common: rollup src/index.js -g d3 | babel > lib/webcharts.common.js && sed -i "s/require('d3')/var d3 = require('d3')/" lib/webcharts.common.js
scripts.amd: rollup src/index.js -f amd -g d3 | babel > lib/webcharts.amd.js
scripts.es5: rollup src/index.js -g d3 | babel --modules ignore | cat lib/open.js - lib/close.js > build/webcharts.js
scripts.build: npm run es5 && npm run uglify
scripts.all: npm run common && npm run es6 && npm run amd && npm run build

author: Rho, Inc.
